metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins using cursor-agent

plugins.name: consultant
plugins.description: Multi-model AI consultation using cursor-agent. Supports consultation, research, and deliberation modes.

plugins.name: skill-utils
plugins.description: Utilities for creating and validating Claude Code skills. Scaffolds new skills with proper structure.

plugins.name: history-analyser
plugins.description: Search and summarise Claude Code conversation history. Find past discussions and generate work summaries.

plugins.name: dev-utils
plugins.description: Developer workflow commands for common git and project tasks.
